content.html: It's OK to make jokes about neurodiveristy. Neurodiversity has this image where it's all very serious and sensible but NDs are some of the funniest people I've ever met - and a frequent source of humour is our own conditions. Humour makes it easier to engage with people too.
content.value:
It's OK to make jokes about neurodiveristy.

Neurodiversity has this image where it's all very serious and sensible but NDs are some of the funniest people I've ever met - and a frequent source of humour is our own conditions.

Humour makes it easier to engage with people too.
